paper_abstract: We consider the complexity of the two-variable rank generating function, S, of a graphic 2-polymatroid. For a graph G, S is the generating function for the number of subsets Of edges of G having a particular size and incident with a particular number of vertices of G. We show that for any x,y is an element of Q with xy not equal 1, it is #P-hard to evaluate S at (x,y). We also consider the k-thickening of a graph and computing S for the k-thickening of a graph.
paper_title: Evaluating the rank generating function of a graphic 2-polymatroid
